subtitle: How can we summarize our service into one document?

overview.Tools:: Requirements Gathering, Interviews, Usability Testing, Parallel Design Prototyping, Card Sort

problem.Problem Space: At any point in a user's interaction with the managed accounts platform, they can view a pdf snapshot of their account. The wide variety of user states and scenarios means this document needs to be multi-functional without being overwhelming with information.

image-sections.blurb: Using the existing version of this document as a basis, I created cards to represent the pieces of information to perform a hybrid card sort. This allowed me to see what information users were still interested in seeing and what gaps of information the current document did not fill. image-sections.title: Divergent Designs
image-sections.blurb: The card sort results combined with internal stakeholder needs informed the content of this document. From there, we mocked-up multiple visuals of the PDF. Using these visuals we performed a series of usability tests as well as A/B preference tests to help us converge into our final design.
